Name: inhrelid
Description: This is the reference to\n the subtable, that is, it records the fact that the identified table is inherited from some other table.

Name: inhparent
Description: This is the reference to\n the parent table, from which the table referenced by inhrelid inherited from.

Name: inhseqno
Description: If there is more than one\n subtable/parent pair (multiple inheritance), this number tells the order in which the inherited columns are to be arranged. The count starts at 1.
